DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this research study is to investigate different types of task training to determine if training improves thinking processes following traumatic brain injury.
DOC.brief_title: Training Executive Functions to Facilitate Recovery Following Traumatic Brain Injury
DOC.criteria: If you have had a Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI)or no history of neurological disease/damage. If you are between the ages of 19 and 65. For participants with Traumatic Brain Injury: If you have a history of prior neurological disorders (e.g., stroke, seizures, or brain tumor). If your Brain injury is less than 6 months ago. For healthy participants: If you have a history of prior neurological disorders (e.g., head injury, stroke, seizures, or brain tumor). For All participants: If you have significant psychiatric history (such as schizophrenia or bipolar disorder.) If you have a alcohol or drug abuse history. If you are currently taking certain types of medications, which the study doctor will review. If you do not have a working knowledge of the English Language.
